text: Melillan People's Union (; UPM) was a Spanish political party based in Melilla. It existed between 1985 and 2003, when it merged into the nationwide People's Party (PP). ==References== Category:1985 establishments in Spain Category:2003 disestablishments in Spain Category:Political parties established in 1985 Category:Political parties disestablished in 2003 Category:Political parties in Melilla Category:Conservative parties in Spain
title: Melillan People's Union
